name: Puffins: Let's Fish!
synopsis: Dive into the deep blue sea and fill your belly with delicious fish in PUFFINS: LET’S FISH! This action game has you swimming the beautiful ocean looking for a puffin’s favorite meal—the elusive capelin. But watch out! The ocean can be a dangerous place and you’re not the only one hunting for food. Sharks, jellyfish and other fearsome predators are just waiting to take a bite out of you. It’s an all-you-can-eat feast in two different and exciting gameplay modes across 18 underwater stages. So be careful, take a deep breath, jump in and come out with a full belly! Yum!
